Articles.Content: I think there should be more stock command pods, Like a high capacity 7 Kerbal one, and a 2 Kerbal one you get after the mark 1, but before the mark 1-2. As well as a command pod built specifically for rovers.

I took the liberty of moving this to Suggestions and Development Discussion and adding a more descriptive title.

The pod format I really long for is a one- or two-kerbal 1.25m cylindrical pod that fits in a Mk2 cargo bay.

> 
> I took the liberty of moving this to Suggestions and Development Discussion and adding a more descriptive title.
> The pod format I really long for is a one- or two-kerbal 1.25m cylindrical pod that fits in a Mk2 cargo bay.

Thank you. That is also a good idea.

I'd like to have Dragon V2-like capsule. With some LF/O, monoprop and engines as a one part. Could be slightly bigger than Mk1-2 pod and have 4 kerbals.

E: by bigger I mean higher/longer/more aerodynamic, but still 2.5m radius.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-30T21:30:43Z" title="06/30/2015 09:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 30, 2015</time> by Veeltch**
I'd personally like to see a 2.5m in-line (cylindrical) command pod with a length/height between that of the hitchhiker and the MPL, and a crew capacity of 4.
I'd like a 2.5m lightweight Gemini-like 2seat pod, it would have a wide base but be overall smaller than the Mk1-2 pod.
As for the 7 kerbal one, I suggest you take a look at the taurus HCV mod, which adds just that (full witty interior with stock-appearance inculded).
I'd like to see a Desk IVA for all probe cores as stock, also we need a set of two seat Mk1 cockpits, and a proper rover command pod,
